page.title: 18Family Life-Lydden
page.content: Jim and Ruth King have lived at "Shangri La",40,Canterbury Rd,Lydden for 8 years and appreciate the lovely views of the North Downs.Jim works for Thorn-EMI in Dover and Ruth is a former teacher.They have one son,James,who is nearly two and they are expecting another baby in November.Jim is a Monday Club leader at the Apostolic Church.They are renovating their bungalow but James tore off the wall- paper in his bedroom!The conservatory roof has recently been rebedded to stop it leaking.They had planned to replace rotten woodwork but Jim's motorbike was stolen from their garage recently.It has now been found but Jim has had to spend valuable time repairing it.He has also taken Thursday afternoon off to repair the car.Some friends came around to help and they had replaced the head gasket by 9.30pm.
